properties.entry: INSERT INTO HORSE_RESERVATION VALUES( SEQ_RESERV_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, ? )
SELECT HORSE_TIME FROM HORSE_RESERVATION WHERE HORSE_DATE = ?

SELECT RESERVATION_NO, HORSE_PRO_NAME, TO_CHAR(HORSE_DATE) "HORSE_DATE", HORSE_TIME, RIDER_NUM FROM HORSE_RESERVATION JOIN HORSE_PROGRAM USING(HORSE_PRO_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND MEM_NO = ? ORDER BY HORSE_DATE
SELECT HORSE_PRO_NO, HORSE_PRO_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PRICE FROM HORSE_PROGRAM
SELECT RESERVATION_NO, MEM_NO, HORSE_PRO_NO, TO_CHAR(HORSE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "HORSE_DATE", HORSE_TIME, RIDER_NUM, MESSAGE FROM HORSE_RESERVATION WHERE RESERVATION_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE HORSE_RESERVATION SET HORSE_PRO_NO = ?, HORSE_DATE = ?, HORSE_TIME = ?, RIDER_NUM = ?, MESSAGE = ? WHERE RESERVATION_NO = ? AND MEM_NO = ?
